Class MarketScene

public class MarketScene

      FIll resources in the market with White_Marbles substitutions
      Parameters:
      marketState - the market actual state
      hasDiscount - tells if the player has any discount
      substitutions - for each white marble substitution, the reward
      background - the initial background that has to be modified
      Returns:
      final backgroun
